name: Otter Waiver – Waiver Embed
author: Otter Waiver

sections.description: This plugin allows Otter Waiver users to easily add an otter waiver to their website. It does this by allowing you to add a pop-over to your website that shows the waiver.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin using the plugin screen in the WordPress admin section or manually to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set the url to the otter waiver you would like to use and adjust any other relevant settings.
sections.faq:
Do I need an OtterWaiver.com account to use this plugin?

Yes, you must have an Otter Waiver account to properly use this plugin.

Will this add the waiver pop-over to all the pages on my website?

Yes, this will add it to all the pages on your website.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Fixed issues with tab opening correct window on mobile.

1.0.2

  • Fix for pop-over being under other objects on the page.

1.0.1

  • Minor adjustments to how font is displayed.

1.0.0

  • First Release

short_description: This plugin allows you to quickly and easily add a Otter Waiver to your website.
description: This plugin allows Otter Waiver users to easily add an otter waiver to their website. It does this by allowing you to add a pop-over to your website that shows the waiver.
